title: Shadow and Light: Digitally Reconstructed Radiographs for Disease Classification
details: B Hou, Q Zhu, TS Mathai, Q Jin, Z Lu, RM Summers - arXiv preprint arXiv:2406.03688, 2024
abstract: In this paper, we introduce DRR-RATE, a large-scale synthetic chest X-ray dataset derived from the recently released CT-RATE dataset. DRR-RATE comprises of 50,188 frontal Digitally Reconstructed Radiographs (DRRs) from 21,304 unique …
